mdRecord.dcterms:title: You are respectfully invited to attend the anniversary celebration of the Jefferson Society, to be held in the Chapel of the University, on the 13th of April, at 7 o'clock P.M.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holman, B. O. (Burette O.)
Hutcheson, J. W.
University of Virginia. Jefferson Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 14 x 20 cm. folded to 14 x 10 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed at end of invitation: "Jefferson Hall, March 11th, 1852."
"Orator, J.W. Hutcheson of Mecklenburg County, Va. Reader of Declaration of Indepence, B.O. Holman of Alabama."
Invitation printed on p. [1] only; p. [2]-[4] are blank.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Signed "With respects of Robert Bolling Jr." Transferred from UVa Chronological file, 2000.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia. Jefferson Society.
